# GLOBAL PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

A first mover in extrusion, COEXPAN is the trusted packaging partner for global FMCG companies worldwide.

We have been revolutionizing the rigid packaging market since 1973 with our innovative, efficient and sustainable solutions which add value and competitiveness to our product range, while delivering high quality results based on unrivalled industry expertise and customer service.

## MARKETS

## LATEST NEWS

![Programa de incentivos para el Autoconsumo](https://www.coexpan.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/programa-de-incentivos-para-el-autoconsumo-254x184.png)

#### [Grupo Lantero will present the innovations of its Coexpan and Emsur business units at the Interpack trade show in Düsseldorf](https://www.coexpan.com/grupo-lantero-will-present-the-innovations-of-its-coexpan-and-emsur-business-units-at-the-interpack-trade-show-in-dusseldorf-2/)

Madrid, April 17th, 2023 – We are delighted announce our participation in Interpack, the benchmark trade show for the packaging, container and packaging industry that will take place from 4th to 10th May. At this important trade show for our sector, we will show our sustainable packaging solutions and innovations developed to respond to market needs \[…\]

Wednesday, 31 July 2024

![](https://www.coexpan.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/post-lantero.jpeg)

#### [Grupo Lantero will present the innovations of its Coexpan and Emsur business units at the Interpack trade show in Düsseldorf](https://www.coexpan.com/grupo-lantero-will-present-the-innovations-of-its-coexpan-and-emsur-business-units-at-the-interpack-trade-show-in-dusseldorf/)

Madrid, April 17th, 2023 – We are delighted announce our participation in Interpack, the benchmark trade show for the packaging, container and packaging industry that will take place from 4th to 10th May. At this important trade show for our sector, we will show our sustainable packaging solutions and innovations developed to respond to market needs \[…\]

Tuesday, 18 April 2023

![](https://www.coexpan.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/ECO_Styro_COEXPAN-254x184.jpg)

#### [Ineos Styrolution and Coexpan claim food contact standards across all dairy formats using 100% mechanically recycled polystyrene](https://www.coexpan.com/coexpan-claim-food-contact-mechanically-recycled-polystyrene/)

INNOTECH (Grupo Lantero’s research and development center for packaging solutions) has today announced the successful completion of trials with the full range of yoghurt cup formats. The trials addressed formats used in both European and American markets using Styrolution® PS ECO 440FC MR100 material, a 100% post-consumer recycled polystyrene grade produced from household food packaging \[…\]

Friday, 30 September 2022

![](https://www.coexpan.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Imagen-Hispack-2022-EN-254x184.png)

#### [Grupo Lantero will present its sustainable packaging solutions at Hispack 2022](https://www.coexpan.com/hispack/)

We will present our sustainable packaging solutions in rigid and flexible plastic and cardboard.

Thursday, 05 May 2022

#### Privacy Overview

This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.

GLOBAL PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

A first mover in extrusion, COEXPAN is the trusted packaging partner for global FMCG companies worldwide.

We have been revolutionizing the rigid packaging market since 1973 with our innovative, efficient and sustainable solutions which add value and competitiveness to our product range, while delivering high quality results based on unrivalled industry expertise and customer service.

MARKETS

Processed Food

Coffee and Tea

Home and Personal Care
